00001 # Thomas Nagy, 2005

00004 import os, re, types, sys
00005 
00006 def detect(env):
00007         def getpath(varname):
00008                 if not env.has_key('ARGS'): return None
00009                 v=env['ARGS'].get(varname, None)
00010                 if v : v=os.path.abspath(v)
00011                 return v
00012 
00013         prefix          = getpath('prefix')
00014         execprefix      = getpath('execprefix')
00015         datadir         = getpath('datadir')
00016         libdir          = getpath('libdir')
00017         qtincludes      = getpath('qtincludes')
00018         qtlibs          = getpath('qtlibs')
00019         libsuffix       = ''
00020         if env.has_key('ARGS'): libsuffix=env['ARGS'].get('libsuffix', '')
00021         if not libsuffix:
00022                 if sys.platform == 'darwin':
00023                         libsuffix='.dylib'
00024                 else:
00025                         libsuffix='.so'
00026 
00027         p=env.pprint
00028 
00029         # do our best to find the QTDIR (non-Debian systems)
00030         qtdir = os.getenv("QTDIR")
00031         if qtdir and env.find_file('lib/libqt-mt' + libsuffix, [qtdir]): qtdir=None # qtdir for qt3, not qt4
00032         if not qtdir:
00033                 qtdir=env.find_path('include/', [ # lets find the qt include directory
00034                                 '/usr/local/Trolltech/Qt-4.0.3/', # one never knows
00035                                 '/usr/local/Trolltech/Qt-4.0.2/',
00036                                 '/usr/local/Trolltech/Qt-4.0.1/',
00037                                 '/usr/local/Trolltech/Qt-4.0.0/'])
00038                 if qtdir: p('YELLOW', 'The qtdir was found as '+qtdir)
00039                 else:     p('YELLOW', 'There is no QTDIR set')
00040         else: env['QTDIR'] = qtdir.strip()
00041 
00042         # if we have the QTDIR, finding the qtlibs and qtincludes is easy
00043         if qtdir:
00044                 if not qtlibs:     qtlibs     = os.path.join(qtdir, 'lib')
00045                 if not qtincludes: qtincludes = os.path.join(qtdir, 'include')
00046                 #os.putenv('PATH', os.path.join(qtdir , 'bin') + ":" + os.getenv("PATH")) # TODO ita 
00047 
00048         # Check for uic, uic-qt3, moc, rcc, ..
00049         def find_qt_bin(progs):
00050                 # first use the qtdir
00051                 path=''
00052                 for prog in progs:
00053                         path=env.find_program(prog, [env.join(qtdir, 'bin')])
00054                         if path:
00055                                 p('GREEN',"%s was found as %s" % (prog, path))
00056                                 return path
00057 
00058                 if not env['WINDOWS']: #(js) temp. check
00059                         # else use the environment
00060                         for prog in progs:
00061                                 path=env.find_program_using_which(prog)
00062                                 if path:
00063                                         p('YELLOW',"%s was found as %s" % (prog, path))
00064                                         return path
00065                         
00066                         # and then try to guess using common paths ..
00067                         common_paths=['/usr/bin', '/usr/local/bin', '/opt/bin', '/opt/local/bin']
00068                         for prog in progs:
00069                                 path=env.find_program(prog, common_paths)
00070                                 if path:
00071                                         p('YELLOW',"%s was found as %s" % (prog, path))
00072                                         return path
00073 
00074                 # everything failed
00075                 p('RED',"%s was not found - make sure Qt4-devel is installed, or set $QTDIR or $PATH" % prog)
00076                 env.Exit(1)
00077         
00078         print "Checking for uic               :",
00079         env['QT_UIC']  = find_qt_bin(['uic', 'uic-qt4'])
00080 
00081         print "Checking for uic-qt3           :",
00082         env['QT_UIC3'] = find_qt_bin(['uic3', 'uic-qt3'])
00083 
00084         print "Checking for moc               :",
00085         env['QT_MOC'] = find_qt_bin(['moc', 'moc-qt4'])
00086 
00087         print "Checking for rcc               :",
00088         env['QT_RCC'] = find_qt_bin(['rcc'])
00089 
00090         # TODO is this really needed now ?
00091         print "Checking for uic3 version      :",
00092         version = os.popen(env['QT_UIC'] + " -version 2>&1").read().strip()
00093         if version.find(" 3.") != -1:
00094                 version = version.replace('Qt user interface compiler','')
00095                 version = version.replace('User Interface Compiler for Qt', '')
00096                 p('RED', version + " (too old)")
00097                 env.Exit(1)
00098         p('GREEN', "fine - %s" % version)
00099 
00100         #if os.environ.has_key('PKG_CONFIG_PATH'):
00101         #       os.environ['PKG_CONFIG_PATH'] = os.environ['PKG_CONFIG_PATH'] + ':' + qtlibs
00102         #else:
00103         #       os.environ['PKG_CONFIG_PATH'] = qtlibs
00104 
00105         # check for the Qt4 includes
00106         print "Checking for the Qt4 includes  :",
00107         if qtincludes and os.path.isfile(qtincludes + "/QtGui/QFont"):
00108                 # The user told where to look for and it looks valid
00109                 p('GREEN','ok '+qtincludes)
00110         else:
00111                 if os.path.isfile(qtdir+'/include/QtGui/QFont'):
00112                         # Automatic detection
00113                         p('GREEN','ok '+qtdir+"/include/")
00114                         qtincludes = qtdir + "/include/"
00115                 elif os.path.isfile("/usr/include/qt4/QtGui/QFont"):
00116                         # Debian probably
00117                         p('YELLOW','the qt headers were found in /usr/include/qt4/')
00118                         qtincludes = "/usr/include/qt4"
00119                 else:
00120                         p('RED',"the qt headers were not found")
00121                         env.Exit(1)
00122 
00123 
00124         # TODO make this specific to the the module QT4
00125         if not prefix: prefix = "/usr/"
00126                 
00127         # use the user-specified prefix
00128         if not execprefix: execprefix = prefix
00129         if not datadir:    datadir    = prefix+"/share"
00130         if not libdir:     libdir     = execprefix+"/lib"
00131 
00132         subst_vars = lambda x: x.replace('${exec_prefix}', execprefix)\
00133                          .replace('${datadir}', datadir)\
00134                          .replace('${libdir}', libdir)
00135         debian_fix = lambda x: x.replace('/usr/share', '${datadir}')
00136 
00137         env['PREFIX'] = prefix
00138         env['LIBSUFFIXEXT'] = libsuffix
00139 
00140         #env['QTPLUGINS']=os.popen('kde-config --expandvars --install qtplugins').read().strip()
00141 
00142         # qt libs and includes
00143         env['QTINCLUDEPATH']=qtincludes
00144         if not qtlibs: qtlibs=env.join(qtdir, 'lib')
00145         env['QTLIBPATH']=qtlibs
00146 
00147         # ######### X11
00148         env['LIB_X11']             = ['X11']
00149         env['LIBPATH_X11']         = ['/usr/X11R6/lib/']
00150         env['LIB_XRENDER']         = ['Xrender']
00151 
00152         # ######### QT
00153         # QTLIBPATH is a special var used in the qt4 module - has to be changed (ita)
00154         env['CPPPATH_QT']          = [ env.join(env['QTINCLUDEPATH'], 'Qt'), env['QTINCLUDEPATH'] ] # TODO QTINCLUDEPATH (ita)
00155         env['LIBPATH_QT']          = env['LIBPATH_X11']+[env['QTLIBPATH']]
00156         env['LIB_QT']              = ['QtGui_debug', 'pthread', 'Xext']+env['LIB_Z']+env['LIB_PNG']+env['LIB_X11']+env['LIB_SM']
00157         env['RPATH_QT']            = env['LIBPATH_X11']+[env['QTLIBPATH']]
00158 
00159         env['CXXFLAGS_QT3SUPPORT'] = ['-DQT3_SUPPORT']
00160         env['CPPPATH_QT3SUPPORT']  = [ env.join(env['QTINCLUDEPATH'], 'Qt3Support') ]
00161         env['LIB_QT3SUPPORT']      = ['Qt3Support_debug']
00162         env['RPATH_QT3SUPPORT']    = env['RPATH_QT']
00163 
00164         env['CPPPATH_QTCORE']      = [ env.join(env['QTINCLUDEPATH'], 'QtCore') ]
00165         env['LIB_QTCORE']          = ['QtCore_debug']
00166         env['RPATH_QTCORE']        = env['RPATH_QT']
00167 
00168         env['CPPPATH_QTASSISTANT'] = [ env.join(env['QTINCLUDEPATH'], 'QtAssistant') ]
00169         env['LIB_QTASSISTANT']     = ['QtAssistant_debug']
00170 
00171         env['CPPPATH_QTDESIGNER']  = [ env.join(env['QTINCLUDEPATH'], 'QtDesigner') ]
00172         env['LIB_QTDESIGNER']      = ['QtDesigner_debug']
00173 
00174         env['CPPPATH_QTNETWORK']   = [ env.join(env['QTINCLUDEPATH'], 'QtNetwork') ]
00175         env['LIB_QTNETWORK']       = ['QtNetwork_debug']
00176         env['RPATH_QTNETWORK']     = env['RPATH_QT']
00177 
00178         env['CPPPATH_QTGUI']       = [ env.join(env['QTINCLUDEPATH'], 'QtGui') ]
00179         env['LIB_QTGUI']           = ['QtCore_debug', 'QtGui_debug']
00180         env['RPATH_QTGUI']         = env['RPATH_QT']
00181 
00182         env['CPPPATH_OPENGL']      = [ env.join(env['QTINCLUDEPATH'], 'QtOpengl') ]
00183         env['LIB_QTOPENGL']        = ['QtOpenGL_debug']
00184         env['RPATH_QTOPENGL']      = env['RPATH_QT']
00185 
00186         env['CPPPATH_QTSQL']       = [ env.join(env['QTINCLUDEPATH'], 'QtSql') ]
00187         env['LIB_QTSQL']           = ['QtSql_debug']
00188         env['RPATH_QTSQL']         = env['RPATH_QT']

00191         env['LIB_QTXML']           = ['QtXml_debug']
